intent_atoms.description: Provide operators with a CLI sandbox automation guide that documents pairing isoinspector with signed sandbox profiles, FilesystemAccessKit bookmarks, and the --open/--authorize workflow for headless execution.
The guide must link to the CLI manual and program documentation so operators can discover sandbox automation requirements alongside existing command help.
The guide must include a minimal .sb allowlist that highlights existing App Sandbox entitlements and maps FilesystemAccessKit APIs (openFile, resolveBookmarkData) to CLI automation commands.
The guide must provide troubleshooting and verification checklists covering stale bookmark handling, sandbox profile signing, and the swift test --disable-sandbox regression run.
Sandbox automation flows must stay aligned with security expectations when future code changes occur.
Use a minimal .sb allowlist to expose only necessary App Sandbox entitlements for CLI sandbox automation.
